did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections and Archives, James Branch Cabell Library, Virginia Commonwealth University

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Box/folder, Central Richmond Association records, M 195, Special Collections and Archives, James Branch Cabell Library, Virginia Commonwealth University, Richmond, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Henry Gonner, Executive Director of CRA, in 1984. Additional materials were donated by Fran Johns in 1996.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: The Central Richmond Association is dedicated to enhancing the economic, civic and human vitality of the center of metropolitan Richmond. Through leadership, advocacy and action, the Association and its members support and promote a sound and expanding business environment in Richmond's downtown.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of newspaper clippings, photographs, and event information.
